description: The application dont make it possible to read from external media. This is only a problem in the flathub version and is the same in all xnxxx-apps. Download from the homepage instead (https://www.xnview.com)
summary: Cant see or read external disks or media

description: This is an amazing program. It seems to do what it is supposed to. If you need something like this it is a simple tool to give you the results you are looking at quickly
summary: 20.04LTS Everything seems to work really well

description:
This a really cool tool, makes ugly look nice again ;)
---
Installed through Discover app KDE Neon. Worked straight out of the box no problems.

Super easy to use.
Lots of filters and masks, colour grading sliders.
Flatpak version does work with external media on Ubuntu 22.04
summary: KISS photo filter app with sketch / cartoon / newsprint styles
